actions.text: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 230).
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Pappas.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 230).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 230).

description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 117-333 to establish a new unit at Federal Trade Commission devoted to protecting public interest by monitoring fuel markets to facilitate transparent and competitive market practices.
purpose: Amendment establishes a new unit at Federal Trade Commission devoted to protecting public interest by monitoring fuel markets to facilitate transparent and competitive market practices.
